title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and more.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interface for Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team, exposing local models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into servers with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread context, file uploads and reaction triggers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling.

title: ollama-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator that manages Ollama instances and model caches declaratively.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama services and run LLM tests.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform CDK) constructs to provision Ollama on AWS ECS, GCP Cloud Run and Azure Container Instances.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and development shells with CUDA & ROCm.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with async/await and serde types.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama generated from OpenAPI specs with context support.
